data.title: Hotels in Sanya, China
data.meta_description: InfoseekChina covers everything from top stories to business and investing, science & technology, government & politics, travel & tourism, sports, entertainment & much more.
data.text:
Guest House International Hotel Sanya Guest House International Hotel Sanya is an oasis of tranquility from the hustle and bustle of the busy downtown. Â It is a four-star hotel... Hilton Sanya Resort & Spa Set among tropical gardens, the Hilton Sanya Resort and Spa boasts a great location on a spectacular stretch of private beach.Â Holiday Inn Resort Sanya Bay The sweeping curve of the colonial-style Holiday Inn Resort Sanya Bay is just metres fromÂ glistening Sanya Bay.Â Horizon Resort & Spa The Horizon Resort & Spa is located beachfront at Yalong Beach. Â It is 25-30 minutes to Sanya Phoenix International Airport... InterContinental Sanya Resort

A picture of stylish, serene beauty, this Sanya hotel resort is nestled between pristine beachfront on one side and scenic mountains on the other.

International Asia Pacific Convention Center & HNA Resort Sanya Located In the heart of picturesque Sanya Bay resort district, the International Asia Pacific Convention Center & HNA Resort Sanya is conveniently located. Resort Golden Palm The Resort Golden Palm is located in Sanya, a famous tropical seashore city, in Hainan Province in the South China Sea. Resort Intime Sanya With its distinctive architecture and lush tropical gardens the Resort Intime Sanya is a romantic beachfront hotel... Ritz-Carlton, Sanya Experience The Ritz-Carlton, Sanya, a luxury resort within a tropical beachside city. Located just 30 minutes from the Phoenix International Airport... Sanya Marriott Resort & Spa Nestled on a pristine sweeping 7 km crescent of white-sand beach cupped by rainforest covered mountains and caressed by crystal-clear waters... Sheraton Sanya Resort Our seaside setting is ideal for water sports, from kayaks and jet skis to scuba diving and deep sea fishing. Tianhong Resort Hotel
